website_summaries.verdict: With silent motors and an attractive design, this is a sleek option that looks great.
pros: This handmade watch winder can take care of four watches at once with its silent Japanese motors and multiple programming options
The case is entirely handmade, and the winder is powered by battery or AC adapter
cons: A few customers reported that their motors stopped working after several months

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for 4 watches. Worked for less than 6 months and motor stopped working. Now I have an unusable display case. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Econ

customer_reviews.title: FOLLOW-UP - Seller responded immediately and sent a new unit working great now!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I contacted the seller about the problem with the first unit and they send another one promptly! It has been in use for much longer now and it is working great! LOVE this item! It is good looking, easy to clean and very quiet! I would definitely recommend this seller now! OLD COMMENTS: Product has been in use for 6 mos-has stripped a gear & one side no longer works! Would NOT recommend this product for that reason. Will follow-up with the seller's response. I am contacting the seller now.
customer_reviews.author: speedymail1

customer_reviews.title: JQueen truly cares about their customers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a four watch winder in mid December. The unit itself is beautifully made and has an excellent fit and finish. It's also very easy to use and has multiple settings to fit your winding preference. Unfortunately the unit developed a small issue with it's function. JQueen was extremely helpful in resolving my issue. Their customer service is responsive, prompt, and highly professional. It was quite clear they wanted to make sure I was pleased with my purchase. I can say with assurance that JQueen stands behind their products. And I would not hesitate to purchase my next watch winder from them. 5 star service all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good-Looking Box
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, and it keeps the watches wound. It’s not silent, but it’s quiet enough to keep in my bedroom. This is a replacement unit for me. The old one died after about two years and was not repairable (you can’t open the unit: it’s all glued together; no screws). Also the old unit had a locking lid which I wish this one had. But at this price I’ll be perfectly happy if this one lasts only two years as well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Nice looks, quiet, great value, requires external timer to avoid over winding
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Very nice external construction and quiet motors for a very good price. As others have noted though, a very important caution: by their own notes in the package, these wind about 2500-3000 TPD (turns per day) which is 3-4x more than needed for most brands (650-1000) like Rolex or Breitling. By my own test, the motors are initially spinning about 20% faster than that (~10 tps vs the 6-8tps specified in the packaging sheet). Just put this on an external timer for only 6-10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quiet Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: I have found the JQueen 4 watch winders to be very well made, very sturdy and beautifully finished. The motors are quiet and work very well in all four programmed winding modes. I liked my first one so much, I recently purchased a second one. One maintenance item I monitor is the tightness of the set screws holding the watch carousels to the electric motors' drive shafts. One loosened a bit after about 9 months and the motor got a little noisy until I retightened the set screw.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product looks very nice and works great. Was a little disappointed at first as one (or both, I can't remember now) of the motors wouldn't turn. I plugged and unplugged the unit several times into different outlets but to no avail. Finally, I just turned, by hand, the round piece that the watches sit in and the motor suddenly worked. Hasn't failed once in the last five months...hopefully it'll stay that way. 4/15/20 I'm revising my review because one of the motors died less than a year into use....basically it's worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: robi1138

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I am so thoroughly disappointed. I have not opened the item to see if it works like it is supposed to because it is a Christmas gift for my husband. That being said, it is stamped on the box in big bold letters WATCH WINDER. So when he got home and it was sitting on the porch, he could clearly read what his Christmas present is. I am so unhappy. It was totally not necessary to announce to the world what was purchased. The several stamps stating fragile were enough. I don't know what the thinking behind this was, but it certainly ruined a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and looks nice to
customer_reviews.text: First let me say ive been in the clock and watch buissness for 40 years. Ive read some guys nonsense here concerning the spring being over wound with the timing cycle. All I aan say is bull. Some people know just enough to be dangerous. The motor is quiet and the watches hold securely and dont get jostled around while spinning. Great product and looks nice to. I would compare this to the star tac of 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: roadwarrior hawk

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap and cheerful, and that’s about the end of it. It doesn’t have an interior light or a charging port for new digital watches... but for the price you really shouldn’t expect the extras. I got about six months out of it before the left assembly began wobbling violently and making enough noise to wake the dead. The right motor burned up about thirteen months in and barely turns. Sadly, requests for warranty support went unanswered for both issues. It’s ok for what it is.. but don’t expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Pillows are very small
customer_reviews.text: Once again the Asian manufacturing world doesn't take into consideration the size of anyone other than an Asian. The winder is aesthetically pleasing, worked OK out of the box, the motors are quiet, the acrylic window is cheap and thin, the interior is nothing special and the "pillows" (watch holder inserts) are tiny. Completely useless for someone that has a watch that fits a large wrist and that's me. I'm not that big a person (6'4" - 210) but this thing needs some serious modifications to keep my watches from flopping around on every turn.
customer_reviews.author: CatDog

customer_reviews.title: Company follow-up
customer_reviews.text: JQUEEN customer service contacted me to be sure I was happy with their product. Yes, yes I am. However let's keep in mind that I was also happy (after a week's worth of use) with the Diplomat watch winder. The problem is, the Diplomat stopped working after about 7 months of use, and Amazon was wonderful in the way they handled that situation. This watch winder is for four watches and cost more than twice the cost of the (two watch) Diplomat. And so far (I have it about a week) it runs smoothly and is very quiet. At this point I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Alan The Knower

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. The winder stopped working just after a year and the inserts that hold the watch in place started flaking apart. It looked promising at first but has not stood the test of time. It is also loud when it was actually operating.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch winder
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for months now. Very nice looking. Looks very expensive and winds my watches nicely. Very quiet. I keep it under my night stand and you can't even hear it. Was concerned about some reviews saying it broke down a few months out. Love it and recommend it for a beautiful watch winder. Only issue I have is the watch holder/ pad is a bit small for a couple of watches and it fits a bit too tight. Worried it might damage my band or links.
customer_reviews.author: TKO

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: One winder died about 16 months in to use, and the second winder has now died about 22 months into use. You can buy more expensive winders. Not sure they will last any longer. These are very simple devices, so I am not sure why it would die at all. Power, motor, gear....pretty simple. I will take it apart now that both have died and see if there is anyway to fix the insides. Overall, it worked well when it worked, but pretty disappointed that it didn't even make it to two years before completely dying.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Returned a different winder and got this one
customer_reviews.text: This is big but beautiful. Runs smoothly and quietly. Watches fit the adjustable pillows for me and my wife and we have different brands that work better with two different settings. Liked this one so much I ordered another for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Travis J. Tindal, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking dual-voltage winder
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch winder. The wood finish makes it look nice on most any dresser. The cushions for the watches should securely hold most any watch. The watches do not clang together when I have the winder on. I like that it is dual voltage (110/220). One criticism, which others have noted, is that all of the settings wind the watches too much/too often. I got an external timer and set it to turn the winder on for only 12 hours per day, then set the winder on 2 min. clockwise, 2 min counterclockwise, then rest 6 minutes. This is enough to keep my watches wound.
customer_reviews.author: Fbx_Steve

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Went noisy after a couple months. Contacting seller for return or exchange is impossible. STAY CLEAR.
customer_reviews.author: Mousey

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is quiet enough to leave on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is quiet enough to leave on our nightstand and it keeps the time of all of our watches. I wish the watch holders had more options for adjusting the size because I have to smoosh it down to fit my watch and my husband's watch is too large so it flops around slightly. It is very pretty and very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Samira K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to look at but don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to look at but both of the winding beds have lost screws, turn awkwardly and makes noise when turning. Most days they don't turn at all. Horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was pleased the seller contacted me in advance of receiving the watch winder, very good customer service. I have had the watch winder now for one week and so far so good. I like the quality, the different modes that you can use, and that you can use 2 D batteries as well as 110 V for power. Based upon previous experiences (other brands), I just hope this winder will have longevity. I will update my rating after 6 months. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper from the South.

customer_reviews.title: Investigate the motor of your watch winder before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: September 2020. Motor died. Just died. Basically, the same company manufactures this motor for several distributors. So you can pay for an expensive wolf product, or other manufacturer, but bear in mind the motor they are inserting is most likely the exact same motor as this model that I have purchased. I am very pleased with this model, simple instructions& very elegant. The finish is just beautiful. I did need to prop it open for a while, because it had a stinky smell to the Vinyl liner.
customer_reviews.author: ACMA

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: When I took this out of the box I was surprised at how good the wood in ebony looks. It's very convincing and the texture is awesome. Only thing that's missing from the looks is a glass window. It's actually a thin plexi. It arrived scratched up but I was okay with that. I started it up and it was loud, turns out the plastic motor base was cracked through. They sent a replacement that came 2 days later and this one is whisper quiet. Still had a scratch in the window but just a small one. I'm happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: that_1_guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish. Classy looking interior and silent. Glad I purchased. UPDATE-went to grab one of the watches and noticed all had stopped dead. On setting 4 which according to the company provided the most turns. Started a return and found the return window was only 30 days. Delivered on Oct 6 and the window closed November 5. Nothing in the return policy mentioned that tight of a return window. I'm sure I'll end up eating this one and will spring for the Wolf. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: SMVA

customer_reviews.title: JQUEEN Automatic Quad Winder
customer_reviews.text: Over all I like the looks and smooth operation of this item, but the bad news is that one of the motors has become noisy and may need replacement already. I was sent a new motor and my unit works like it's supposed to. The manufacturer was more than easy to work with and tried very hard to make me satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Boy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this winder is very impressive. The appearance is surprisingly nice. The lacquer, clear cover, knobs, hinges, interior material, everything is much, much nicer than the price would suggest. And the motors are truly whisper quiet. I've had two different watch winders (Versa and Diplomat) before this, and I can't believe they were all near the same price point. They felt cheap and obviously plastic, and I felt like I had to hide them out of the way. This one feels heavy and substantial, and it actually looks good on display by itself. No regrets, this unit from jqueen is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shmamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, quiet and wonderful to display timepieces
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to buy a winder for 4 watches as other products allow the timepieces to move and can “collide” among them. This winder is well built and keeps the watches in place. It is very quiet and it looks great as a display for your watches. I like the fact that the rotors stop when you open the cover unlike other winders that need to be turned off before opening them. Great quality I am satisfied and recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marco A Olivera

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only two reasons why not 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only two reasons why not 5 stars. 1 the pillows are a little small on some watches, so they end up sitting loose and sometimes knocking against each other. I had to put some rubber bands around it to make it bulkier. The other is that it makes a clicking sound when you open it. Don't know if it's supposed to do that or something in the hinge is loose. otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. The motor are pretty quiet. I can only hear a like noise when turning. The case is pretty and presents well, especially with the large glass lid. I was slightly surprised at how large it was, but it's not unreasonable. You just need to be sure you have a space to put it. In a standard dresser it takes up space so plan accordingly. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice winder case
customer_reviews.text: This winder case was only "silent" for about a week. Since then, it has been "quiet," which is fine. It looks really nice with the wood grain finish. And it does what it's suooosed to do. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: PrncsSara

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfection
customer_reviews.text: A lovely, well-made cabinet. The materials are excellent, and the options for using both or only one rotating station is useful. The only drawback is the bit of noise that can interrupt a light sleeper such as myself (I left off one star). After several nights of waking up to the light sounds of the winder, I elected to turn off the device before sleep and turning it on in the morning. Problem solved. With a quieter motor/gear mechanism, this would be a perfect 5-star report.
customer_reviews.author: Beaner

customer_reviews.title: Great Winder!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this winder for over a year and can’t say enough good things about it. I don’t think you could get a better product at any cost. The winder is virtually silent and can be operated at any time of day including overnight while sleeping. The only minor complaint I would have is that my larger watches don’t fit as tightly in the slots as I would like. This causes the watch to move a little while the winder is operating. If they had another layer on the pillow and a little deeper slot that would eliminate that issue. Overall I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item site unseen as a gift. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item site unseen as a gift. The gift recipient loves this watch winder storage box. he commented on the its beauty. He will use it to keep his collection of Rolex watches wound. The box is larger than expected but the gift recipient place to acquire a larger safe with access to a power outlet or just depend on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: It's 2 feet from my head and I still can't hear it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going 5 stars for now, simply because this is everything it's supposed to be. It's a gorgeous piece of furniture, and the motors are absolutely silent, even when both are running and changing directions. I only have 3 automatic watches, but this doesn't care. The watches are really heavy pieces and there is some shifting that takes place, but it's very minor and silent. Glad I studied up on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece that has worked well until recently when the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in March to replace a much older noisier unit. Beautiful piece that has worked well until recently when the right motor started making a grinding noise. It is in the bedroom and used to not be able to hear the winder at all, now it is about noisy enough to wake you up. Trying to get in touch with the manufacturer to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: mhdurden

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Just received this winder, plugged it into my wall outlet (checked for power), and it doesn't work at all! Does the unit need to charge? Anyone else have this issue? The case looks great, but if it doesn't work, or is defective, what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Louis L.

customer_reviews.title: Beats the competition hands down
customer_reviews.text: Looked high and low for a reasonably priced watch winder that was both functional and attractive. This is it! While not quite silent in operation, it is nevertheless unobtrusive in most environments and does its joy well for all four watches stored on its rotating dials. A very good product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Just About Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of - art! And the direction setting controls are firm and positive. Two issues with me though: 1. A couple of rough openings underneath the wheel appear to have been hand-filed as an afterthought to accommodate the fittings and 2. Pillows have only two adjustments, and small-wrist watches will have difficulty wrapping around even the smaller adjustment, and nothing gives.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: I should have paid attention to the other reviews. ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the other reviews. Within a month the bearings on one of watch carriers began making noise. A couple of weeks later we had to unplug it every night so we could sleep. Beyond return window. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Peacock

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this but then I opened it up. The veneer is put on so poorly that in areas in does not cover they simply paint it brown and it DOES NOT MATCH. Not a good quality finish, but I was going to still keep it until I opened up the cover. The control panel with the two knobs was not even attached to the rest of the unit. POOR QUALITY. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: SD Mar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Super Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Tried two different models from different manufacturers prior to getting this one and this one is by far the best of them all. It was on the recommended for purchase list right here on Amazon and it was spot on. Very nice looking and so quiet that I can't even hear it when it's running a cycle - while sitting right next to it. So far, so good. Definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Winder, Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ~10 months ago. So far, it has performed very well. I have 4 high-end watches in there now, and all have maintained their "wind" well. The sound it makes is relatively quiet, but not silent (that is my only gripe, albeit small... I would still buy it again).
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money! Poor motor durability. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although good looking this winder has terrible durability issues. After returning the first winder I bought for excessive motor noise the second winder had a motor quit outside the warranty period. Based upon my experience I would never recommend anyone waste their money on this winder. Buyer beware. This winder is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Van Wert

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect more than a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Looks very elegant. The noise level isn't absurd, but I wouldn't have it near your bed either. However, it isn't made well at all. This will die before a year runs out. Mine kept watches running fine for a few months then one wheel went out, a couple months later, the other did as well. For this much money, it should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: Best,best,best!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and very versatile! Looks great and expensive and does the job. Seller is super responsive. I asked a question and they responded immediately. Highly recommended this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I own several watch winders and I find that this one is an excellent value. It is extremely quiet, simple to operate and is much smaller than the ones that have built in storage space for watches (not being wound). While many of the watch winders on the market cost much more than JQUEEN, I don't think they are fundamentally any better.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stoever

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch winder with a quality wood box, holding 4 fairly heavy men's watches. I am withholding review until we have had it longer as previous watch winders from other brands have stopped working within a year when one of,the motors quit working, thus the 4 stars. If the motors continue to work, I would increase the rating.
customer_reviews.author: dls

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This winder box is so pretty. I bought another watch, so I had to replace my two-watch winder with the four-watch winder. It is just as nice and functional as my original JQUEEN product. Hopefully I won't be tempted to purchase another watch soon to fill the empty spot!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Rewton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: We have our watch winder displayed on our dresser. It looks very nice and of good quality. My SO and I are watch people (real, timeless, watches - not the new smart watches) and I take it off when I get home and don't put it on until after I return from the health club the next morning. It's used to be stopped and I'd always have to reset it. I figure that keeping it moving and not having to always set it is probably good for it and for me. We have the four watch winder in case we both get another watch (maybe a dress watch). Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Baca

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap product! One side stopped working after 2
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap product! One side stopped working after 2.5 mos. Don't buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenka Basarabova

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Workmanship of the box is great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Workmanship of the box is great. Just hope that these Japanese motors last as they should. Had two bad experiences with other made in China ones, one DOA, and anther refused to restart after a week's vacation ( watches stored at bank), bought on eBay!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product. Beautifully made with high quality components. Extremely quiet. Great value for the price. Seller contacted me to ensure I was satisfied. I definitely would buy this product and use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Harold F Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It failed right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but this watch winder came to me defective. It looks nice, but never saw it in operation. Update 8/18/2019: JQUEEN's customer service is quite good. They contacted me shortly after posting my review, and sent me a replacement unit. The unit has worked well for the past 10 days, and I don't foresee any other issues going forward. The company seems to be quite serious about their reputation and providing a product that's satisfactory to the customer. So far am happy with what I have gotten, as the replacement unit...
customer_reviews.author: Mahamane

customer_reviews.title: Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: The watch winder is a really cool way to wind multiple watches at the same time. It operates using batteries or can by plugging into a wall electrical outlet. My husband has been very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: norac

customer_reviews.title: Nice Winder!
customer_reviews.text: The winder is very nice and quiet (love the 4 setting choices, #4 with Rolexes is perfect), the case is actually very well made; looks just like the picture! I would of gave it the 5th star but my wrist is good size so my watches band/links are a bit bigger then the cushion in the slots; I had to find another 4 peices of cushion so the watches sit in nice and tight. Now if you have average normal size watches then you may be just fine, overall I'm satified for the price we paid... hope it last a long time this winder.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The case is well made and has a good heft and feel
customer_reviews.text: Unit functions as advertised and is very quiet. The case is well made and has a good heft and feel, appearing much more expensive than priced. Had an initial problem with the cushions as my watches slipped off of them; since I lost some weight I was able to remove a link and now they fit snug. Warning:if you are a person with overly large wrists your watch may not stay on the pillow and will slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Doug76

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and nearly silent.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Beautiful case. It is almost silent from 5 feet away. I have ordered a timer because even at the lowest setting it will wind too many times per day. Ordered a Kasa smart plug. This smart plug has an app. Works great
customer_reviews.author: jdtsmada

customer_reviews.title: My second one.
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted about five years then one rotor started slipping. Bought another because they are too good a deal to pass up. New one is working for about six months now. Suggest you use a timer to limit the on time for the winder though so you don’t overwind your watches.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smirnov

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Watch Game Changer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a watch collector. I have 3 and my husband has 1 automatic watches. This is exactly what the watch doctor ordered. I got so aggravated to having to wind my watches everyday. This beautiful winder changed everything. Unit looks and works as described. Looks beautiful sitting on my table and most of all it displays my watches perfectly. Great Product and great seller. This item is a must if you even have 1 automatic. You will get another at some point and will already have a winder to keep your watches ticking.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Akiba

customer_reviews.title: No surprises. Running true to spec so far.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. As the specs said it's very quiet. Nice selection of modes. Only had it for about a month. So, can't attest to it's durability. I only run it about 9 hours per day because i like my watch springs to "wind out" a little bit, instead of keeping them fully wound all the time. Is this better for the watches? Who knows ? There's so many varying opinions on whether mechanical watches need to run all the time or not. But if the watch has a lot of complications or it's a perpetual calendar, you don't want to be resetting it if you don't wear it that often. So, a winder becomes necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, good product design.
customer_reviews.text: We like how this product works, it is a good price for holding 4 watches. Great design as you can see the watches being winded. The motor is silent, you cant hear it. Clever design
customer_reviews.author: robin lockhart

customer_reviews.title: One of the best watch winders
customer_reviews.text: I'm a watch collector. I own 10 automatic watches which require automatic watch winder. Believe me, I've gone through a few winders over the years. This winder is one of the best! Whisper quiet and works really well. You can't go wrong with these winders.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch winder that operates as advertised. Good service.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used my watch winder for 5 days but I am very pleased with it so far. Far superior to my previous winder which I also bought on amazon. First of all it has 2 separate motors vs 1, it is extremely quiet, it stops when the cover is open and it is winding all my automatic watches whereas my previous 1 didn’t wind 1 of my watches. Also excellent service from the provider. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Great winder
customer_reviews.text: The winder works as advertised. It looks great and is very quiet. Like others have observed the rotation rate is fast. I believe using the last setting should alleviate any concerns about overwinding. I will probably be buying another one in near future as my collection is fairly large and I rotate just a bout daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: The product does not work from day one. can't ...
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work from day one. can't believe a brand new product does not work. Now i am stuck with sending it back which has always been my reluctance to purchase on line.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Castellon

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I e had this one month and the left rotator only spins for a few seconds and quits! Very upset at spending 129.00 for something made so poorly!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Winder comes with electrical connector, but does not run ...
customer_reviews.text: Winder comes with electrical connector, but does not run plugged in. Does work with batteries. Should work with either one. No way to contact merchant supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice. It is very quiet. That’s the positives. The rotation speed in the Item Description from supplier is not right. The manual doesn’t have the same one either. I thought the pillows would be adjustable to fit different size watches, but no adjustability, so watches slide around while rotating. Sad to see that the actual speed is more than recommended for my Breitling’s, so not any value for me to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Buckles

customer_reviews.title: the setting knobs are easy to use and the winder is whisper quiet as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this item for almost a month. The directions are very clear, the setting knobs are easy to use and the winder is whisper quiet as described. The outside case is beautiful and looks like a higher end model. So far, I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb-J

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and useful winder
customer_reviews.text: Fills well the purpose, looks gorgeous and is easy to use. Minor things that decreased my review from 5 to 4: - If you have a small wrist like me (e.g. attached on third hole on Omega leather band) the pads, where watches are attached, might be too big and requires a bit too much force to wrap watches around them. - Also, all non-US customers, consider that the product does not include other than US type of charger. So, adapter required before usage.
customer_reviews.author: Antti

customer_reviews.title: JQUEEN Automatic Quad Watch Winder
customer_reviews.text: If you own more than one automatic watch,]; an automatic winder is a necessity. This winder is attractive, well made and quiet. It is not silent, but quiet. You can sleep if it is in your bedroom for morning convenience in dressing. Its price point also recommends it..
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about seven months...
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I thought that this was a terrific purchase. However, after about seven months, the left sided winding wheel completely stopped working. It is too late for me to send it back, and I have no idea where to send it to be fixed. As a result of this, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish, very quiet. Very reliable so far. Revised 3/16/17 - Not so quiet anymore. In fact, it sounds like an old truck with a bad transmission. Had to move it out of the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Muhlenkamp

customer_reviews.title: A great watch winder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great winder and keeps my watches working well and keeping good time. This is important to me, since a couple of my watches have 5 or more functions. It is very time consuming if you have to reset each function because you let those watches unwind and stop. It is also a beautiful piece of craftsmanship that looks great on your dresser.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch winder at a very good price with 4 settings. I've been using it for a month or two on 1 side on setting 3 (2 min clockwise; 5 min pause; 2 min counter clockwise) on a timer for 6 hours a day (6pm-12midnite). It keeps 2 Swiss automatic watches well wound; it's silent and looks good). Highly recommend; would definitely but again.
customer_reviews.author: MCFox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch winder. I am going to purchase again, If you have automatic watches you cant go wrong getting this winder, it looks and works great, highly Recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the man who has everything!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is impossible to buy for, and he loves his high-end watches. I purchased the two watch version of this winder about a year and a half ago. My husband’s watch collection has grown so I just purchased this watch winder so he can wind all four of his watches now. The winder is beautiful and is so quiet! It totally suits my husband’s expensive taste and the price was reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient watch winder with best customer service
customer_reviews.text: They are the most convenient watch winders. I used to own a different winder which only ran on current but did not run on batteries. But, when I started using this, it has changed my life. I can put it anywhere and it can still run on batteries. It doesn’t make much sound. They also have the best customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sus S.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the plastic two watch winder
customer_reviews.text: I had a plastic two watch unit that rattled and lasted just two years. This one is well made and SILENT. Having four slots I am motivated now to expand my auto collection. I was limited to what I had before because I had two autos already. Like I need an excuse to buy another watch, but I always enjoy a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Rosicrucian

customer_reviews.title: It's noisy and it is stop working now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost 3 years now and now the unit is completely stop working. I don't know how long this going to last but I expect it's have to last more than my watch in order to maintain my watch but I'm wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Nghia Doan

customer_reviews.title: Says what it does on the tin:does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Very nicely made, striking appearance, gets lots of admiring comments. Very quiet in operation and keeps my watches wound and keeping good time. On the strength of this, when my collection expanded I purchased the six watch winder and had a different experience.....
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch winder excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected several choices for winding watches and it has two winders that appear to operate independently.
customer_reviews.author: Mastercard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Watch Winder. Did Not Work Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Looked beautifully crafted out of the box. Did not work at all
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Occhipinti

customer_reviews.title: A good value purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice, and works well for four watches. It’s a bit big and loud, which means it’s more comfortable to leave it in my closet, but has kept my watch power well. I used a watch with a power tracker to see how well it stayed wound, and it stayed the same after a few days. Pros: sound price, pretty craftsmanship, works well Cons: somewhat big and unwieldy, fairy loud
customer_reviews.author: James Keene

customer_reviews.title: Getting your moneys worth/ little bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great price for what you get. It looks really sleek and with your watches in it looks even sleeker. I went with the mahogany color and gave it to my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it. It is a little bit loud so if you want it in your room I would keep that in mind in case you are a sensitive sleeper, but other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie howe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch case/winder for 4 automatics.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality box and watch winder for your automatics. Solidly made and looks more expensive than it is. I also like the 4 available settings that you can choose to keep your watches wound. Great buy. UPDATE - Less than 6, months old and the right turntable is already broken. I hope the company will honor their "18 month warranty"
customer_reviews.author: arthur

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works, but after a few days I can hear the motor. I had it on the night stand, but had to move it to the dessert because of the noise. One of the slots was also loose and I had to use double sided tape to make it more secure.
customer_reviews.author: y2says

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Excellent quality/finish. Operates very quietly. The only reason I did not give it a 5 rating is because I have a large wrist, so I have longer straps and additional links on my watches. They do not fit snug on the pillows, so the watches move around when spinning. Otherwise, 5+++. .
customer_reviews.author: Don V.

customer_reviews.title: The watch winder actually works.
customer_reviews.text: The best feature for the watchwinder, is that it works perfectly. My automatic watches are maintaining perfect time. Previous winders failed the basic function.
customer_reviews.author: JD of San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful , versatile and quiet.  Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This four-watch automatic winder works perfectly! Very versatile with several settings that allow for clockwise / counter-clockwise and alternating with five minute pause in between to accommodate various watch brand requirements. Motors are very quiet. Fit and finish is really nice and this winder looks great for displaying watches as well. Shipping was fast and item was packed extremely well. VERY satisfied and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  D. Mantooth

customer_reviews.title: Now that I put it back together I works great.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I put it back together I works great. When I opened the box there were two screws in the bottom of the watch winder. They held the winders in place. After figuring out how to take them apart it was an easy fix. For the price it should have been assembled corectley when I received if
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, very nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very nice, good quality. Decorate any area. It works perfectly well, so the watches keep running. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Castro Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It works fantastic for only one watch. For the other 3 watches, I have not found a setting that works yet
customer_reviews.author: Darren Zemnick

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but nice
customer_reviews.text: This winder looks and feels like quality, but it is a bit noisy (clearly audible but not too distracting). The winder also has multiple settings based on different lengths of time to wind the watch. I'm not sure how durable this winder will be, but it has to be one of of the best winders at its price point.
customer_reviews.author: CommunityChannel

customer_reviews.title: Seller stepped up and sent a new one after initial quality problem
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with this winder initially. The seller stepped up and sent a new one - the new one works as expected. I just received it so 4 stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: Stschott

customer_reviews.title: Sorry but l can only give it one star. ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but l can only give it one star . The right motor stopped working .ls it possible that you can replace it ?
customer_reviews.author: juan castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Great Style & Value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! It works as advertised and it looks great. It’s near silent.
customer_reviews.author: LSK

customer_reviews.title: promise did not fulfill
customer_reviews.text: pillows are firm and do not fit to both mine and my wife's watches. seller says they will send me smaller pillows, but nothing after 2 and half months. after almost another month wait. I received a cheap cheap cufflinks, don't know what's seller's purpose. NOT reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. Noise level isn’t a factor for me as it sits in my closet. Hold four automatic watches with four different levels of automatic movement. Owned this since December with no complaints. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Newt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Be sure that it fit ur electrical system in your country. Good looking perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ebrahim Alabkel

product_meta.title: JQUEEN Watch Winder with Quiet Motors
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :12.6 x 7.87 x 7.09 inches; 4.41 Pounds
 * Item model number :W004
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :October 27, 2015
 * Manufacturer :JQUEEN
 * ASIN :B0177ZAZEQ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #61,780 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #11 inWatch Winders 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars771 ratings
feature_bullets: Powered with Japanese super silent motor no running noise. Nice looking, easy to operate.

100% handmade and good value. The use of acrylic glass, environmental protection piano lacquer and transmission using copper fittings. 4 turntables with PU soft watch pilow, smooth, atmosphere and quality with high-grade.
Watch winder motor have 3 direction settings (clockwise, counter-clockwise and alternating) and multiple Turns Per Day settings.

Upgraded 5 Program Settings : Mode 1:OFF. Mode 2 : 4.5 mins CW, rest for 55.5 mins, Repeat. Mode 3 :4.5 mins CCW, rest for 55.5 mins,Repeat. Mode4:4 mins CW, rest for 26 mins, then 4 mins CCW, rest for 26 mins,Repeat. Mode 5 : 6 mins CW, rest for 24 mins CCW(work 4 hours, rest 8 hours) ,then 4.5 mins CCW, rest for 55.5 mins(work 4 hours, rest 8 hours).
Dual power supply more reasonable. Powered by 100-240v AC Adapter(included) or 2X 1.5V Battery (not included). Dimensions: 32 * 18 * 20 CM.
